name: Animal Swapper
description:
A game made  in a week by Dagon_Dev and NewBrDev for WeeklyGameJam#140

Our first GameJam

Theme: Shapeshift

Controls:

WASD: Move

Space: Jump

Z: Attack

X: Interact

Animals: Rhyno

- Low Jump

- Moves Slower

- Can break Wooden Doors

Bird

- Double Jump

- Normal Speed

Mouse

- Normal Jump

- Moves Faster

- Can pass through small spaces
